tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE humidity_data (
  sensor_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  greenhouse_id INT,
  humidity DECIMAL,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE humidity_data (sensor_id UUID,
                  greenhouse_id UUID,
                  humidity_percentage DECIMAL,
                  timestamp TIMESTAMP,
                  PRIMARY KEY (sensor_id, timestamp));

CREATE TABLE greenhouse (greenhouse_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
              location TEXT,
              temperature DECIMAL,
              humidity_threshold DECIMAL,
              last_inspection TIMESTAMP);

CREATE TABLE greenhouse_sensors (
    sensor_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    sensor_name VARCHAR(50),
    location VARCHAR(100),
    humidity_level DECIMAL(5,2),
    temperature DECIMAL(5,2)
);

CREATE TABLE sensor_readings (
    reading_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    sensor_id INT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    humidity DECIMAL(5,2),
    temperature DECIMAL(5,2),
    FOREIGN KEY (sensor_id) REFERENCES greenhouse_sensors(sensor_id)
);

CREATE TABLE humidity_sensors (
 sensor_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 sensor_location VARCHAR(50),
 sensor_type VARCHAR(50),
 humidity_value FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE greenhouses (
 greenhouse_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 greenhouse_name VARCHAR(50),
 location VARCHAR(50),
 capacity INT
)

CREATE TABLE plant_species (
 species_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 species_name VARCHAR(50),
 optimal_humidity FLOAT,
 optimal_temperature FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE sensor_readings (
 reading_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 sensor_id INT,
 reading_time TIMESTAMP,
 humidity_value FLOAT
 FOREIGN KEY (sensor_id) REFERENCES humidity_sensors(sensor_id)
)

CREATE TABLE plant_growth (
 growth_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 greenhouse_id INT,
 species_id INT,
 reading_id INT,
 growth_time TIMESTAMP
 FOREIGN KEY (greenhouse_id) REFERENCES greenhouses(greenhouse_id),
 FOREIGN KEY (species_id) REFERENCES plant_species(species_id),
 FOREIGN KEY (reading_id) REFERENCES sensor_readings(reading_id)
)
CREATE TABLE greenhouse_sensors ( sensor_id UUID PRIMARY KEY, greenhouse_id UUID, humidity DECIMAL, temperature DECIMAL, timestamp TIMESTAMP )
CREATE TABLE greenhouses ( greenhouse_id UUID PRIMARY KEY, location TEXT, max_capacity INT )
CREATE TABLE plants ( plant_id UUID PRIMARY KEY, plant_name TEXT, optimal_humidity_range JSONB, optimal_temperature_range JSONB )
CREATE TABLE sensor_logs ( log_id UUID PRIMARY KEY, sensor_id UUID, humidity DECIMAL, temperature DECIMAL, timestamp TIMESTAMP )
CREATE TABLE users ( user_id UUID PRIMARY KEY, username TEXT, email TEXT )
